problem.markdown:
Stay on the outliers dashboard. Do not change the settings except for the Options. Set the options as follows: under Display columns, select Outliers. Set outlier filter to Modified Z-Score, followed by Extreme. Keep the Dimensions as before. In the table, sort by Outlier column from high to low.
Which facility has the highest outlier in the resulting table?
>>Select the one correct answer: (2 attempts)<<
( ) A. Facility 543 ( ) B. Facility 565 (x) C. Facility 553 ( ) D. Facility 478
[explanation] The correct answer is Facility 553. [explanation]
